Korean: 아홉 시 사십 분에 출발하는 게 열 한 시 이십 분에 도착한다고 하셨잖아요
English: You said it leaves at nine forty and arrives at eleven twenty.

Korean: 여사울에서 보통 실리까지 얼마 정도 걸릴까요
English: How long does it usually take from Yeosuul to Sili?

Korean: 선생님 당진에 있는 실리 성지 성당 말씀 맞으십니까
English: Teacher, are you referring to the Sili Holy Land Cathedral in Dangjin?
No, it's the Sili Holy Land in Daejeon.

Korean: 선생님 실례지만 제가 실리 성지 성당 확인해 보았습니다
English: Excuse me, teacher, but I checked the Sili Holy Land Cathedral.

Korean: 대전이 아닌 당진시 합덕으로 있는 부분으로 확인됩니다
English: It is confirmed to be in Hapdeok, Dangjin-si, not Daejeon.
Yes, #@address# is correct
Yes, are you asking about the time it takes for public transportation?

Korean: 만약에 이쪽에서 순례를 하면 도보로 갈 텐데요
English: If you make a pilgrimage from this side, you will go on foot.

Korean: 그냥 대중교통으로는 지금은 당진까지 얼마 정도 소요되나요
English: How long does it take to get to Dangjin by public transportation now?

Korean: 여사울 성지에서 실리 성지 성당까지 대중교통으로 이동을 하실 경우요
English: If you are traveling from Yeosaul Holy Land to Sili Holy Land Cathedral by public transportation

Korean: 약 사십 분 정도로 소요가 됩니다
English: It takes about forty minutes.

Korean: 사십 분 정도요 그럼 도보로 하면은 한 시간도 넘게 걸리겠네요
English: About forty minutes. If you walk, it will take more than an hour.

Korean: 그 부분까지는 저희 쪽에서 정확한 확인은 어렵습니다 선생님
English: It is difficult for us to confirm that part accurately, sir.

Korean: 그러면 용산역에서 실리 성지로 가게 되면 아홉 몇 시에 있나요
English: Then, if I go from Yongsan Station to Sili Seongji, what time is it at 9?

Korean: 선생님 검사소가 아닌 도청 부서 연결 요청이십니까
English: Sir, is this a request to connect to the wiretapping department and not the inspection office?
Yes, it's not a car inspection station.

Korean: 네 제가 다시 한 번 확인해보겠습니다 자동차 검사를 관련해서요
English: Yes, I will check again regarding the car inspection.

Korean: 지정업체를 관리하는 부서가 있을 거 아니에요
English: There must be a department that manages designated companies.
Yes, I understand what you said, teacher.

Korean: 감독하고 관리 감독하는 부서가 있을 거 아니에요
English: There will be a department that supervises and manages
It's an automobile-related department.

Korean: 네 선생님 제가 다시 한 번 확인 후 안내해 드리겠습니다
English: Yes, sir. I will check again and let you know.
Okay, please check.

Korean: 네 선생님 문의 주신 부분 혹시 시군청에는 문의를 해 보셨습니까
English: Yes, teacher, have you tried contacting the city or county office regarding the part you asked about?

Korean: 아니요 구청에 있는 걸로 알고 있었는데
English: No, I thought it was at the district office.

Korean: 그러셨습니까 선생님 해당 지정 업체는 제가 확인해보니
English: Is that so, sir? I checked with the designated company.

Korean: 해당 지역 시군청으로 문의를 주시는 부분으로 확인이 됩니다
English: You can confirm this by contacting the local city/county office.
Yes, it's the city/county office. It's the city/county office, not the district office.
Yes, I will connect you to the representative phone number of #@affiliation#
What department are you in charge of at the city/county office?

Korean: 선생님 부서까진 어렵고 제가 #@소속# 대표 번호로 연결을 해드리겠습니다
English: It's difficult to get to your department, so I'll connect you to the representative number of #@affiliation#.
Nice to meet you, #@Affiliation# #@Affiliation#Name# How may I help you?

Korean: 충청 산업문화철도 사업 담당자가 누군지 좀 알고 싶은데요
English: I would like to know who is in charge of the Chungcheong Industrial and Cultural Railway project.
Sorry, can you say that again?
Yes, Chungcheong Industrial and Cultural Railway.

Korean: 네 충청 산업문화철도이십니까 문의주신 부분 확인후 안내해 드리겠습니다
English: Yes, is this the Chungcheong Industrial and Cultural Railway? I will check the part you inquired about and give you information.
Could you please wait a moment?
Yes, please guide me.
Yes, thank you for waiting.
#@Name# I think the part you asked the injection would be good

Korean: 제가 기획관리실에 내용 전달해서 선생님께 연락드릴 수 있도록 하겠습니다
English: I will forward the information to the Planning and Management Office so that they can contact you.
Do you have any further questions?
Then let me ask you one last question.
Yes, it's okay, teacher.
Yes, it's the Central Region East-West Cross-Country Railway.

Korean: 예 중부권 동서횡단철도이십니까 제가 #@URL# 기사를 확인해 보겠습니다
English: Yes, is it the Central Region East-West Cross-country Railway? I will check the article #@URL#

Korean: 중부권 동서횡단철도 관련해서는 천안시 교통과로 문의를 주세요
English: For inquiries regarding the Central Region East-West Cross-Country Railway, please contact the Cheonan City Transportation Department.
You can contact the Cheonan City Transportation Department.

Korean: 네 천안시 교통과로 연락하시면 될 것 같습니다
English: Yes, I think you can contact the Cheonan City Transportation Department.
Okay, I understand

Korean: 네 감사합니다 무더운 날씨에 건강 유의하시기 바랍니다 #@소속# #@이름#였습니다
English: Yes, thank you. Please take care of your health in this hot weather. #@Affiliation# #@Name#
Nice to meet you, I'm #@Affiliation# #@Name# How may I help you?
Yes, it's nothing else. I'm trying to reissue my nursing assistant license.

Korean: 선생님 요양보호사 재발급 구비서류 문의 맞으십니까
English: Teacher, are you asking about the documents required for re-issuing the nursing assistant license?
Yes, I would like to inquire about reissue.

Korean: 네 선생님 혹시 첫 교부 받으신 지역이 충청남도 맞으십니까
English: Yes, teacher, is the region where you first received the teachings in Chungcheongnam-do?
Yes, that would be correct.

Korean: 혹시 재발급 사유가 어떻게 되시는 지 말씀 부탁드립니다
English: Could you please tell me the reason for the reissue?
Yes, I lost it and would like to get it reissued.
Yes, sir, is it lost?

Korean: 접수 방법으로는 방문 접수와 우편 접수가 있습니다
English: There are two methods of application: in person application and mail application.
How can I guide you?
I am an agent. Can I get it issued?

Korean: 제가 대리인발급 관련해서 확인 후 안내해 드리겠습니다
English: I will check and inform you about the proxy issuance.
Yes, please confirm that you are an agent.

Korean: 네 문의 주신 부분 저희쪽에서 확인 어려워 제가 죄송합니다
English: Yes, I apologize for the difficulty in confirming the part you asked about.

Korean: 제가 저출산고령화 대책과 담당자에게 문의 후 안내해드리겠습니다
English: I will contact the person in charge of the low birth rate and aging population countermeasures department and then inform you.
You can't answer directly there.

Korean: 네 대리 발급 관련해서는 콜센터에서는 답변이 어렵습니다
English: Yes, it is difficult for the call center to answer questions regarding proxy issuance.
Then I'll call you back later.
Yes, please take care of your health in this hot weather. #@Affiliation# #@Name#
Nice to meet you, #@Affiliation# #@Affiliation#Name# How may I help you?

Korean: 예 축산자원개발부 이전 사업 담당자가 누군지 좀 알고 싶은데요
English: Yes, I would like to know who was in charge of the previous project at the Livestock Resources Development Department.

Korean: 축산자원개발부 이전 사업 담당자 연결 요청이십니까
English: Is this a request to connect with the person in charge of the previous project of the Livestock Resources Development Department?
Yes, please give me the previous person in charge

Korean: 선생님 실례지만 축산자원개발부라는 게 어떤 업무인가요
English: Excuse me, teacher, but what does the Livestock Resources Development Department do?

Korean: 국립 축산 자원 개발부라는 기관이 있는데 그 기관의 이전 담당자요
English: There is an organization called the National Livestock Resources Development Agency, and I am the former person in charge of that organization.
Teacher, is the part where you called #@affiliation# correct?
Yes #@Affiliation# is correct

Korean: 제가 축산과에 문의 후 연결해 드리겠습니다
English: I will contact the livestock department and connect you with them.
Hello, this is #@Name# from the Livestock Department.
Yes, hello, this is #@Affiliation# #@Name#

Korean: 축산자원개발부를 이전 사업 담당하시는 부서를 찾고 계십니다
English: We are looking for a department in charge of the previous project of the Livestock Resources Development Department.
That area is managed by the Planning and Management Office.
Planning Manager, thank you for checking.
Yes, thank you. Thank you for your hard work.
Nice to meet you, I'm #@Affiliation# #@Name# How may I help you?

Korean: 네 다름이 아니고 요양보호사 자격증 대리발급을 하려는데요
English: Yes, it's nothing else. I'm just trying to get a nursing assistant certificate issued on my behalf.

Korean: 네 문의 주신 부분 저희쪽에서 확인 어려워 제가 죄송합니다
English: Yes, I apologize for the difficulty in confirming the part you asked about.

Korean: 제가 저출산고령화 대책과 담당자에게 문의 후 안내해드리겠습니다
English: I will contact the person in charge of the low birth rate and aging population countermeasures department and then inform you.
Yes, I understand. Please connect me quickly.

Korean: 제가 담당자에게 연결하였으나 현재 연결 지연으로 확인됩니다
English: I have connected with the person in charge, but I am currently experiencing connection delays.
Yes, is it delayed a lot?

Korean: 제가 담당자가 선생님께 연락드릴 수 있도록 메모 전달해드리겠습니다
English: I will forward a note to the person in charge so that he or she can contact you.

Korean: 선생님 성함과 연락 가능한 연락처 말씀부탁드립니다
English: Please tell me your teacher's name and contact information.
That's #@name# #@phone#

Korean: 제가 우선 구비서류를 안내해드릴건데 메모 가능하십니까
English: First, I will guide you through the required documents. Can you take notes?
Yes, you can. Please tell me.

Korean: 네 선생님 신분증과 재발급 신청서가 필요합니다
English: Yes, I need your teacher ID and a replacement application form.
Yeah, just those two.

Korean: 네 선생님 재발급신청서는 저출산고령화대책과에 비치되어 있습니다
English: Yes, teacher, the reissue application form is available at the Low Birth Rate and Aging Society Countermeasures Department.

Korean: 또한 반명함 사진 한 장과 수수료 이천 원이 필요합니다
English: Also, one photo of a business card and a fee of two thousand won are required.
Yes, I understand. Thank you.

Korean: 네 감사합니다 더 다른 문의사항 있으십니까
English: Yes, thank you. Do you have any other questions?
No, there is no more

Korean: 네 무더운 날씨 건강 유의하시기 바랍니다 #@소속# #@이름#였습니다
English: Yes, please take care of your health in this hot weather #@Affiliation# #@Name#
Thank you #@Affiliation#
Hello, this is #@Affiliation# #@Name#
Yes, what do you need?
#@Affiliation# suffered damage due to the loss of a dam managed by the company.
Is there anyone in charge of the Hongseong region who is not in the position?
The person in charge is currently on a business trip.

Korean: 그럼 혹시 대신 답변 가능하신 주무관님 안계실까요
English: Then, is there a person in charge who can answer on my behalf?

Korean: 답변은 직접 담당자분이랑 한번 통화를 해보세요
English: For an answer, please call the person in charge directly.

Korean: 그러시면 혹시 내용 전달 가능 하실까요
English: If so, would you be able to convey the content?
What will be the location of the petitioner?
Your location is Hongseong-gun #@address#
#@Address# Let me look at the map for a moment.
Yes, Hongseong-gun #@address#
The complainant is waiting now
What is the complainant's contact information?

Korean: 민원인께서 기다리고 계시니 통화 후 직접 말씀해주세요
English: The complainant is waiting, so please speak directly after the call.
Okay, so please give me just one contact number.

Korean: 지금 기다리고 계셔서 저희 쪽에서 바로 연결이 가능합니다
English: You are waiting now so we can connect you right away.
Yes, please return the petition to me.
Yes, you can call me right away.

Korean: 여보세요 선생님 민원 내용 말씀하시면 관련 부서로 연결해 드리겠습니다
English: Hello, teacher. Please tell me the details of your complaint and I will connect you to the relevant department.

Korean: 민원실이라고 하는지 나와서 보고 연락해 준다더니 안 오더라고요
English: They said they would come out to the civil affairs office and call me back, but they never came.
Yes, please continue speaking.

Korean: 지금 도로 둑이 무너져 고추 따러도 못 들어가고 있어요
English: The road embankment has collapsed now, so I can't even go pick peppers.
So you mean the embankment on the road?

Korean: 예 도로 둑이 무너져 내려 앉았어요
English: Yes, the road embankment collapsed and collapsed.

Korean: 그러신가요 현재 둑이 무너진 곳의 정확한 주소가 어떻게 되나요
English: Is that so? What is the exact address of where the dam collapsed?
The road name address is #@address# and the old address is #@address#
Yes, I checked the address #@ in Hongseong-gun
And I also saw the civil engineering manager at that office.

Korean: 거 온 사람들이 도청으로 연락해 준댔는디 해 줄 거라고 안 했나요
English: Didn't the people over there say they would contact you through wiretapping?

Korean: 지금 밭에 물고여 가지고 들어도 못 가는데 민원실에다 직접 넣을라 그랬는디요
English: I can't even take it to the field right now because it's stuck there, so I was thinking of putting it in the civil affairs office.

Korean: 네 제가 확인 후 안내해 드리겠습니다 잠시만 기다려 주시겠습니까
English: Yes, I will check and let you know. Could you please wait a moment?
Yes, I will wait for your guidance.

Korean: 네 제가 #@소속# 홍성 지역의 담당자로 바로 연결하겠습니다
English: Yes, I will connect you directly to the person in charge of #@affiliation# Hongseong region.
You said you'd connect me to Hongseong
Yes sir, I am from #@affiliation# of #@affiliation#
Yes, please connect to #@affiliation#
Yes, I will connect you right away.
Nice to meet you, I'm #@Affiliation# #@Name# How may I help you?
I'd like to contact the wiretapping civil affairs office.

Korean: 네 민원실에도 여러 담당자가 자리하고 있습니다
English: Yes, there are several staff members in the civil affairs office.

Korean: 여기가 저번에 비가 많이 와서 여기 지금 둑이 유실된 데가 있거든요
English: There was a lot of rain here last time, so there's a part of the dam that's been washed away.
But they said the jurisdiction is wiretapping

Korean: 비가 많이 와서 둑이 유실됐다는 말씀이신가요
English: Are you saying that the dam was washed away because of the heavy rain?

Korean: 네 둑이 무너져 내려서 지금 밭이 있는데 다 내려 앉았거든요
English: Yes, the dam collapsed and now the field is all flooded.

Korean: 하우스 밭 꽃 심은데 물이 많이 고여서요
English: I planted flowers in the house garden, but there is a lot of water.

Korean: 네 선생님 도청 담당이라고 전달을 받으셨습니까
English: Yes, sir, did you receive a message that I was in charge of wiretapping?

Korean: 예 전화했는데 면사무소랑 나와서 보더니 도청 관리래요
English: Yes, I called and the cotton office came out and said it was the wiretapping manager.

Korean: 그러시면 선생님 둑이 유실된 주소가 어떻게 되십니까
English: Then, sir, what is the address where the dam was lost?
This is called #@address#
What area is #@Address# in?
#@Address# located at #@Address# in Hongseong-gun
Yes, is this Hongseong-gun #@address#?
Yes, please wait a moment.
Yes, I will wait for your connection.
It's a sunny morning. #@Affiliation# #@Name# How may I help you?
Yes, I have a question regarding real estate.
Yes, what are you talking about specifically?

Korean: 제가 일 가구 이 주택잔데 양도 소득세 문의 할려구요
English: I have a house that I work in and I would like to inquire about the capital gains tax.
I checked and it turns out that the Ministry of Planning and Finance is in charge of #@affiliation#

Korean: 거기 전화번호를 모르는데 전화번호가 어떻게 돼죠
English: I don't know the phone number there, what is the phone number?
Can you take notes now?
Yes, you can take notes
Then I will call you. My phone number is #@phone number#
Yes, I wrote it down. Thank you.
Thank you, counselor #@name#
Nice to meet you, this is #@Affiliation#. How may I help you?
#@Affiliation# I would like to speak to the person in charge of personal rehabilitation.

Korean: 네 혹시 실례지만 그게 #@소속# 국민행복기금 관련 맞으십니까
English: Excuse me, but is that related to the #@affiliation# National Happiness Fund?
Yes, that's right, National Happiness Fund

Korean: 네 #@소속#  전화번호 확인되어 제가 바로 연결하겠습니다
English: Yes, #@affiliation# Your phone number has been confirmed and I will connect you right away.
Yes, please connect. Thank you.
Teacher, I am truly sorry for the inconvenience.
#@Affiliation# The person in charge of the National Happiness Fund is on vacation today

Korean: 현재 해당 직원 중 한 명이 #@소속#으로 출근한 부분이 확인되었습니다
English: Currently, it has been confirmed that one of the employees has gone to work as #@affiliation#

Korean: 해당 홍성 행복기금으로 문의를 주셔도 상담이 가능할 듯합니다
English: You may be able to get advice by contacting the Hongseong Happiness Fund.

Korean: 예 휴가 가셨구나 상담만 되면 다른 직원이라도 괜찮아요
English: Yes, you went on vacation. If you just need advice, any other employee is fine.
Could you please leave a note of my phone number?
Yes, please call my number.
#@Phone number#, are you a teacher?
Is your phone number #@phone number#?
Yes, that's right, teacher.
Yes, thank you. Thank you for your hard work.
Yes, thank you. Do you have any other questions?
Nice to meet you, #@Affiliation# #@Affiliation#Name# How may I help you?

Korean: 장항성복선 전철사업 담당자 좀 알고 싶은데요
English: I would like to know the person in charge of the Jang Hang Seong Bokseon Line project.
Are you in charge of the Jang Hang Seong Bokseon Line project?
Yes, that's right, the subway

Korean: 네 문의주신 장항성복선 전철사업 담당자 확인되었습니다
English: Yes, we have confirmed the person in charge of the Jang Hang Seongbok Line Electric Railway Project you inquired about.
Could you please take a note?
Yes, you can take notes
Yes, area code #@phone number#

Korean: 잘 안 들려서 그러는데 다시 말씀해 주시겠어요
English: I can't hear you very well, so could you say that again?
Yes, the area code is #@phone#
Yes, what department and who are you?
This is #@Name#, the head of the Road Traffic Department.
Okay, I understand. I'll call you.
Yes, I will forward the memo to the planning office.
Yes, thank you for letting me know.

Korean: 네 무더운 날씨에 건강 유의하시기 바랍니다 #@소속# #@이름#였습니다
English: Yes, please take care of your health in this hot weather #@Affiliation# #@Name#
Nice to meet you, this is #@Affiliation#. How may I help you?
It's nothing else than the Asset Management Department in the wiretapping department.

Korean: #@소속#에 자산관리과로는 확인이 어려워서 업무 내용을 말씀해 주시겠습니까
English: #@Affiliation# It is difficult to confirm with the Asset Management Department, so could you tell me the details of your work?

Korean: 제가 담당 부서 확인 후 연결하겠습니다
English: I will check with the department in charge and then connect you.

Korean: 무슨 업무냐고 다름이 아니고 우리 그런 거 상담하는 거 없나요
English: What kind of work is it? It's not like we can consult about that kind of thing.
I'm really sorry, teacher.
The phone connection is poor

Korean: 어떤 상담인지 다시 한 번만 말씀해 주시겠습니까
English: Could you please tell me again what kind of consultation it is?
I filed for personal bankruptcy.
Have you ever filed for personal bankruptcy?

Korean: 국민행복기금 이라고 신청을 해 갖고서는 도청에서 지원을 해 주는 데가 있어요
English: If you apply for the National Happiness Fund, there is a place where the provincial government provides support.
Would you like to contact the National Happiness Fund Personal Rehabilitation Manager?
Yes, I would like to speak to your representative.

Korean: 네 그렇다면 국민행복기금 담당자로 연결해 드리겠습니다
English: Yes, then I will connect you to the person in charge of the National Happiness Fund.
Yes, I understand. Thank you.
Nice to meet you, #@Affiliation# #@Affiliation#Name# How may I help you?
I would like to know the person in charge of the Planning and Management Office of the Ministry of Livestock Resources Development.

Korean: 네 저희가 기획관리실의 정확한 담당자는 확인이 어렵습니다
English: Yes, it is difficult for us to confirm the exact person in charge of the planning and management office.
Yes, please connect

Korean: 네 현재 기획관리실 담당자가 모두 통화 중으로 확인됩니다
English: Yes, I can confirm that all the Planning and Management Office staff are currently on the phone.
I will forward the memo to the planning and management office.

Korean: 선생님 성함과 연락 가능한 연락처 말씀 부탁드립니다
English: Please tell me your teacher's name and contact information.
My contact number is #@phone#
#@Phone# Please tell me your number and your name.
Your name is #@name#

Korean: 네 #@이름# 님이십니까 제가 내용 전달해 드리겠습니다
English: Yes, is this #@name#? I will convey the information to you.
Teacher, do you have any other questions?
If I wait, you will contact me, right?

Korean: 네 연결 가능할 때 바로 연락드릴겁니다
English: Yes, I will contact you as soon as I can connect.
Yes, I understand. Thank you.

Korean: 네 감사합니다 무더운 날씨에 건강 유의하시기 바랍니다 #@소속# #@이름#였습니다
English: Yes, thank you. Please take care of your health in this hot weather. #@Affiliation# #@Name#
Nice to meet you, this is #@Affiliation#. How may I help you?

Korean: 세종에는 법률 구조 해주시는 데가 없나요
English: Is there no place in Sejong that provides legal aid?

Korean: 동사무소 같은 데 그 변호사들이 와 가지고 해주는 게 있나해서요
English: I wonder if those lawyers can come to a place like a local government office and do something.

Korean: 마을 변호사로 세종 지역 담당자 확인 후에 안내해드리겠습니다
English: We will guide you after confirming with the Sejong area representative as a village lawyer.
Teacher, could you please wait a moment?

Korean: 네 동 직원들이 나와가지고 한 번씩 해주시는 게 있더라고요
English: Yes, there is something that my coworkers do for me every once in a while.
We have confirmed the number of the person in charge of Sejong Special Self-Governing City and will inform you.

Korean: 네 요게 인제 그러면 이름이 #@소속# 으로 되어있습니까
English: Yes, so now your name is #@affiliation#

Korean: 이곳은 #@소속#  그리고 #@소속# 에서 운영하는 마을 변호사입니다
English: This is the village lawyer run by #@affiliation# and #@affiliation#
Then I guess I can ask here

Korean: 딴 거는 여기 변호사들이 나와서 그거 하고 하는 그런 거는 없습니까
English: Isn't there anything else like lawyers coming out here and doing that?

Korean: 변호사들이 따로 세종 지역에 머물면서 안내가 가능한 부분까진 확인 어려웠습니다
English: It was difficult to confirm the parts that the lawyers could provide guidance on while staying separately in the Sejong area.

Korean: 선생님 법률 상담이 가능한지 문의해보시면 좋으실 듯 합니다
English: I think it would be a good idea to ask the teacher if he/she can give you legal advice.

Korean: 시청에 법률 상담을 할 수 있나 물어보면 된다고요
English: You can ask the city hall if you can get legal advice.
#@Affiliation# I will tell you the representative number

Korean: 따로 법률 상담이 가능한지 문의해보시면 좋으실 듯 합니다
English: I think it would be a good idea to inquire about whether separate legal consultation is possible.
Let me ask here first. Yes, thank you.

Korean: 그게 마을로 받아가지고 개인이 그렇게 할 수 있습니까
English: Can that be taken to the village and done by individuals?

Korean: 선생님 문의 하신 부분 제가 확인 후 안내해드리겠습니다
English: I will check the part you asked about and then give you guidance.
Yes sir, I understand

Korean: 네 선생님 오래 기다리게 해드려 정말 죄송합니다
English: Yes, teacher, I'm really sorry for keeping you waiting for so long.

Korean: 저희 쪽에서 확인해보니 군청으로 연락을 하셔야 합니다
English: We checked on our side and found that you need to contact the county office.

Korean: 쉽게 얘기해서 비리가 이렇게 돼 있는데요
English: To put it simply, corruption is like this.

Korean: 그렇게 해도 되는 건지 알고 싶어서 전화한 거에요
English: I called to see if that was okay.

Korean: 아니면 보조금 부정 신고 뭐 거기다 해야 되나요
English: Or do I have to report subsidy fraud or something?
Where should I report this?
Regarding the part the teacher mentioned

Korean: 해당 지역의 시청 또는 군청으로 문의를 주셔야 합니다
English: You should contact your local city or county office.
I'm from Buyeo-gun, so I talked to #@affiliation#
But in Buyeo-gun, they take it to the village.

Korean: 그저 밑 사람이 #@소속#이 그냥 무관하다는 식의 얘기를 하더라고요
English: The person below just said something like #@affiliation# is irrelevant

Korean: 그런데 내가 알기로는 그게 마을로 받아가지고 저거를 하면 안 되잖아요
English: But as far as I know, you can't take it to the village and do that.
Did you make a note of the phone number #@phone number#?
Yes, can you connect me?
Yes, I will connect you right away.
Teacher, I am truly sorry for the inconvenience.

Korean: 담당자가 두 명이고 한 명은 휴가 중이고요
English: There are two people in charge and one is on vacation.

Korean: 나머지 한 담당자가 현재 출장 중으로 인해서요
English: Because the remaining person in charge is currently on a business trip.

Korean: 오후 다섯 시 이후에 통화가 가능하다고 전달을 받았습니다
English: I was told that I could call after 5pm.
As soon as the person in charge arrives

Korean: 선생님께 연락할 수 있도록 메모 전달을 해드리겠습니다
English: I will forward a note to you so you can contact your teacher.
Yes, I checked now. Thank you.

Korean: 전화주신 번호로 연락할 수 있도록 하겠습니다
English: We will contact you at the number you provided.
Excuse me, teacher, but could you tell me your name?
Yes my name is #@name#
#@Name# is this correct?
Yes #@name# is correct

Korean: 담당자가 연락할 수 있도록 메모 전달하겠습니다
English: I will forward your note to the person in charge so he/she can contact you.
No more, thank you
Thank you, this is Rural Village Support Team #@Name#
Hello, this is #@Affiliation# #@Name#
Excuse me, but the person filing the complaint has requested a change to #@affiliation#.
Isn't the person in charge at his/her seat?
The person in charge is currently on a business trip.

Korean: 혹시 담당자 분이 두 분으로 검색 했는데요
English: By the way, the person in charge searched for two people

Korean: #@이름# 주무관님과 #@이름# 주무관님 두 분이 모두 담당하시는 부분인가요
English: Is this something that both #@Name# Manager and #@Name# Manager are in charge of?

Korean: 네 맞습니다 두 분 모두 담당하는 부분입니다
English: Yes, that's right, both of you are in charge of that part.

Korean: 그럼 지금 두 분 다 현재 통화가 어려우신가요
English: So are both of you having trouble talking right now?
#@Name# Sir, you are currently on vacation.
If so, I'm sorry to interrupt you.
#@Name# When will you be available to talk, sir?
#@Name# The chief of staff went on a business trip to Dangjin

Korean: 아마 다섯 시 이후에나 들어오실 것 같은데요
English: I think you'll probably come in after five o'clock.
Yes, I understand. Thank you for confirming.
Nice to meet you, this is #@Affiliation#. How may I help you?

Korean: 거기 농지과는 몇 번이에요 직통번호 알려 주세요
English: What number is the agricultural land department there? Please tell me the direct number.
I'm sorry, sir, but it is difficult to confirm with the agricultural land department.

Korean: 업무 내용을 말씀해 주시면 확인 후 바로 안내해 드리겠습니다
English: Please tell me the details of your work and I will check and inform you right away.
What is your job? What is the number of #@affiliation#?

Korean: 부서 확인 후 바로 안내해 드리겠습니다
English: We will guide you right away after checking the department.
Could you please wait a moment, sir?
Okay, I understand. I'll be waiting.

I'm going to borrow this billion dollar.

Because I was going to ask about the situation now

English: The village chief said that he had the person above him bring it to him.

Yes, that's right. How did it go?

Korean: 선생님 확인해 보니 구급 행정직이신 경우 임용예정기간이 홍성군이시면요
English: Teacher, I checked and if you are an emergency administrative officer, your expected employment period is Hongseong-gun.
No, I asked about the tax office, not the administrative office.
Sir, are you a tax accountant? I will check again.

Korean: 시험일까지 계속하여 충청남도에 주민등록상 주소지를 갖고 있어야 합니다
English: You must maintain a registered address in Chungcheongnam-do until the test date.

Korean: 제가 삼 년 이상 거주하면 무슨 시험이든 가능하다고 잘못 들었나 봐요
English: I think I misheard that if I lived there for more than three years, I could take any test.

Korean: 주민등록상 주소지를 두고 있었던 기간이 총 삼 년 이상인 사람도 가능합니다
English: Anyone who has been registered as a resident for a total of three years or more is also eligible.

Korean: 그 두 가지 중에 하나 요건을 충족을 하면 되는 부분으로 확인됩니다
English: It is confirmed that one of the two requirements is met.
Then I lived from the time I was born until now

Korean: 대학을 대전으로 가서 이번에 주소를 대전으로 옮겼거든요
English: I went to college in Daejeon and this time I changed my address to Daejeon.

Korean: 그래도 내년에 시험보는 건 자격조건이 되는 거죠
English: Still, taking the exam next year is a qualification.
For inquiries in the Daejeon area, please contact Daejeon City Hall.
Okay, I understand. I will contact Daejeon City Hall.
#@Affiliation# How may I help you?

Korean: 지역 공무원 시험 볼 때 자격 조건을 좀 여쭤보려고요
English: I would like to ask about the qualifications for taking the local civil service exam.

Korean: 해당 지역에서 몇 년 거주하는 그런 조건이 있잖아요
English: There is a condition that you have to live in that area for several years.

Korean: 몇 년을 살아야 되는지 현재 거주하고 있어야 되는지 궁금해서요
English: I'm wondering how many years I have to live there or if I have to live there now.

Korean: 문의주신 부분 제가 확인 후 안내해드리겠습니다
English: I will check the part you inquired about and then inform you.

Korean: 선생님 오래 기다리게 해드려 정말 죄송합니다
English: Teacher, I'm really sorry for keeping you waiting for so long.

Korean: 혹시 올해 하반기에 응시를 하시는 부분이십니까
English: Are you taking the exam in the second half of this year?
No, I'm going to look at it as a tax accountant next year.

Korean: 지역을 옮겨놔야 되나 하고 여쭤보는 거예요
English: I'm asking if I should move the area.

Korean: 선생님 내년도이신 경우 변경될 수가 있는 부분이 있습니다
English: Teacher, if you are next year, there are some parts that may change.

Korean: 저희 쪽에서 담당자 확인 후 연결해드리겠습니다
English: We will connect you after checking with the person in charge on our side.
Yes, thank you. Please connect.
This is #@Affiliation# who called. Minors must be accompanied by a guardian.

Korean: 근데 저희가 일을 아침에 일찍 나가거든요
English: But we leave for work early in the morning.

Korean: 혹시 우리 딸 이모가 가면 안 되나요
English: Can my daughter's aunt go?
I'm sorry, sir. Is your daughter an adult?
No, I'm a minor. I'm a middle school student.

Korean: 아까 물어보니까 미성년자기 때문에 딸은 올 필요가 없다셔서요
English: I asked earlier and they said my daughter doesn't need to come because she's a minor.
They said that the parent should just bring the documents
Yes, sir, that's right.

Korean: 만약에 친권자가 일이 있어 갖고 못 갈 시에는요
English: What if the parent cannot take it with him/her due to work?

Korean: 다른 분이 갈 수 있나 해서요
English: I was wondering if someone else could go

Korean: 친권자가 방문 어려울 시에 미성년자인 본인이 방문하실 수 있습니다
English: If the parent has difficulty visiting, the minor can visit.

Korean: 또는 이 촌 이내에 친족이 대리 발급 가능합니다
English: Or, a relative within this village can issue it on your behalf.
Okay, yes, I understand for now.
Yes, do you have any other questions?
No, there isn't. Okay, I understand.
This is #@Affiliation# #@Name# who just called
Are you accessing the #@affiliation# homepage?
Yes, I just got in.

Korean: 그러시면 통합 검색란에 조례라고 검색 부탁드립니다
English: If so, please search for ordinance in the integrated search box.

Korean: 조례라고 검색을 하시면 #@소속# 자치 법규 열람 시스템 확인 가능하십니까
English: If you search for ordinance, can you check the local government ordinance viewing system for #@affiliation#?

Korean: 주황색 글씨로 #@소속# 자치 법규라고 되어 있습니다
English: It says in orange letters #@Affiliation# Autonomous Law
The one with the color in the middle
Yes, that's right. Please click.
So you just need to click on the connected permission
Please search for local roads

Korean: 잠시만요 관리에 관한 업무 처리 지침인데요
English: Wait a minute, these are instructions for handling administrative work.
I don't think this is right or not

Korean: 선생님 죄송합니다 업무 다시 한 번만 말씀 부탁드립니다
English: I'm sorry, teacher. Could you please tell me the task again?

Korean: #@소속# 지방도 관리에 관한 업무 처리 지침만 뜨는데요
English: #@Affiliation# Only instructions for processing work related to local road management are displayed
Wait a minute, it's showing up when I connect there.

Korean: #@소속# 도로와 다른 시설을 연결에 관한 이거 찾은 거 맞아요
English: #@Affiliation# I found this about connecting roads and other facilities.

Korean: 네 맞습니까 더 다른 문의 사항 있으십니까
English: Yes, that's correct. Do you have any other questions?
No, not anymore, thank you
Nice to meet you, this is #@Affiliation#. How may I help you?

Korean: 우체국 분실물 습득센터 같은 데 전화번호가 혹시 있나요
English: Is there a phone number for something like the post office lost and found center?

Korean: 실례지만 우체국 분실물 습득 센터 문의 이십니까
English: Excuse me, is this the post office lost and found center?

Korean: 면허증이나 뭐 지갑 이런 게 혹시 분실하면 문의할 수 있는 곳이요
English: This is where you can inquire if you lose your driver's license or wallet or something like that.
Yes, by any chance, what region is it?
The region is Cheonan, South Chungcheong Province.

Korean: 천안이나 아산 지역에 경찰서에서 관리하는 유실물 센터가 따로 위치하지 않고요
English: There is no separate lost and found center managed by the police station in Cheonan or Asan.

Korean: 천안 기차역과 천안 아산역 그 두 곳만 유실물 센터가 있는 부분으로 확인됩니다
English: Only two places, Cheonan Train Station and Cheonan Asan Station, have been confirmed to have lost and found centers.

Korean: 혹시 신분증이나 이런거 잃어 버리면 우체통에 넣잖아요
English: If you lose your ID or something like that, you put it in the mailbox, right?

Korean: 이런 것을 좀 해보고 싶어 가지고요
English: I'd like to try something like this

Korean: 선생님께서 분실하신 부분이 자격증이나 신분증인 경우는요
English: What if the part you lost is a certificate or ID card?

Korean: 우체국에 넣어지게 되면 발급한 기관으로 이동이 되고요
English: When it is put into the post office, it is transferred to the issuing agency.

Korean: 그 외에 카드나 지갑 같은 경우는 경찰서로 전달이 된다고 합니다
English: In addition, it is said that cards and wallets are sent to the police station.

Korean: 번거로우시겠지만 #@소속#에 문의를 주시면 좋으실 듯 합니다
English: I know it's a bit inconvenient, but I think it would be better if you contact #@affiliation#

Korean: 만약에 여권이나 이런 것들 잃어 버리면 어떻게 해야 되는지요
English: What should I do if I lose my passport or something like that?
If it's a passport, it's difficult to confirm exactly

Korean: 자격증이나 신분증은 발급 기관으로 가기 때문에요
English: Because the certificate or ID card goes to the issuing agency.

Korean: 여권도 혹시 발급 기관으로 문의를 해 보시는 부분이 좋으실 듯 합니다
English: I think it would be a good idea to contact the issuing agency for your passport.

Korean: 폐차장 관련 담당자를 확인하여 선생님께 전화를 드리겠습니다
English: I will check with the person in charge of the junkyard and call you.
Can I leave my number?
Yes, please tell me your teacher's contact information and name.
Yes my phone number is #@phone#
Excuse me, what is your area?
Here I am now in the #@affiliation# junkyard
Are you inquiring about #@affiliation# junkyard?
Are you inquiring about a junkyard permit?

Korean: 예 폐차장 허가에 대한 문의 입니다
English: Yes, I have a question about the junkyard permit.
I will check and call the teacher.
No, there isn't any, please eat

Korean: 네 업무 처리 잘 되시기 바랍니다 #@소속# 콜센터 #@이름#이였습니다
English: I hope your work goes well #@Affiliation# Call Center #@Name#
Hello, this is #@Affiliation# Call Center #@Name# How may I help you?
There's a car junkyard, right?

Korean: 폐차장 허가에 대해서 여쭤볼려면 누구한테 물어봐야 돼요
English: Who should I ask about junkyard permits?
Are you interested in licensing a car scrapyard?

Korean: 실례지만 그 폐차장 허가는 시군청 업무입니다
English: Excuse me, but that junkyard permit is a city/county office matter.
Have you tried contacting the city or county office?

Korean: 예 문의 했는데요 확인할 게 좀 있어 가지고요
English: Yes, I did inquire, but I have some information to check.
Okay, I will check and let you know.
Yes, teacher, I will wait for your guidance.
Yes, thank you for waiting.
I will direct you to the junkyard permit department.
What is the name of the department in charge there?
The department in charge of the junkyard is the Road Traffic Department.
Who is the person in charge of road traffic?

Korean: 정확한 현재 담당자 확인이 어려워 부서로 확인해 보아야 할 거 같습니다
English: It is difficult to confirm the exact person in charge, so you will need to check with the department.
I will check and call the teacher.
Do I need to check with the person in charge?

Korean: 네 폐차장 관련으로 담당자 현재 확인이 어렵습니다
English: Yes, it is difficult to confirm with the person in charge regarding the junkyard at the moment.
Isn't there a city hall under the wiretapping building?
Yes, that's right, city hall

Korean: 네 그러면 위에 업무 밑에 있다는 얘긴데 말이 안 되죠
English: Yes, then that means the work above is under it, which doesn't make sense.
Hello, I am a counselor from #@Affiliation#. How may I help you?

Korean: 빨리 자격증을 발급받으려면 제가 어떻게 해야 할까요
English: What should I do to get my certificate issued quickly?

Korean: 교육 기관으로 신속히 처리될 수 있도록 민원을 제기해 주세요
English: Please file a complaint with the educational institution so that it can be processed promptly.

Korean: 학원에서 신경을 안 써서 제가 직접 발급받으려 해요
English: Since the academy doesn't pay attention, I'm going to get it issued myself.

Korean: 선생님이 서류를 준비하시기에는 교육기관에 협조도 필요한 부분이 있어요
English: There are some areas where teachers need to cooperate with educational institutions in preparing documents.
Yes, teacher, what you said is right.
I'm so frustrated I could die

Korean: 선생님 교육기관에 불편 민원을 제출하는 게 어떨까요
English: Teacher, how about filing a complaint to the educational institution?

Korean: 해당 민원은 도청 요양 보호사 담당자에게 문의를 해보시면 좋으실 듯합니다
English: I think it would be best to contact the person in charge of the nursing care at the city hall regarding this complaint.
Then can it be solved right away?
Yes, I will help you as much as I can.

Korean: 제가 요양 보호사 담당자로 바로 연결하겠습니다
English: I will connect you directly to the caregiver in charge.
Yes, thank you. Please connect me.

Korean: 제가 요양 보호사 첫 교부 시 필요한 서류를 안내해 드릴까요
English: Shall I guide you through the documents required for the first nursing assistant assignment?

Korean: 네 제가 따로 가서 진행할 때 필요한 거 알려 주세요
English: Yes, please let me know what I need to do when I go separately.
Yes, can you take notes?
I'll bring a pen to take notes.

Korean: 네 요양 보호사 발급 신청서가 필요하고요
English: Yes, I need an application for issuance of a nursing assistant.

Korean: 발급 신청서는 어디서 떼 달라고 하는 거예요
English: Where can I get the application form?
#@Affiliation# Can be issued on the website
Yes, you mean the #@affiliation# homepage

Korean: 네 먼저 민원 서식에서 양식을 다운로드하여 작성 해야 합니다
English: Yes, first you need to download the form from the complaint form and fill it out.

Korean: 기재 되는 내용은 교육 기관으로 문의를 해주셔야 하구요
English: For details on the contents, please contact the educational institution.
Do I also need the materials I practiced at the nursing home?

Korean: 네 선생님 요양원에서 실습하셨던 부분도 필요합니다
English: Yes, sir, I also need the part about your practical training at the nursing home.

Korean: 고객님 자격증 발급이 빠르게 진행될 수 있도록 해서요
English: So that the customer's certificate can be issued quickly.
Have you tried calling the academy?

Korean: 네 제가 몇 번이나 학원에 전화를 했어요
English: Yes, I called the academy several times.

Korean: 혹시 선생님이 다니던 학원의 종류는 무엇인가요
English: By the way, what kind of academy did you go to?
The academy I went to was a nursing academy.

Korean: 간호 학원인데 그 요양 보호사 관련 업종은 아니에요
English: It's a nursing school, but it's not a nursing care related industry.

Korean: 그런데 거기 요양 보호사 교육을 그냥 시키더라고요
English: But they just gave them nursing assistant training there.

Korean: 그래서 확실히 전문 학원보다는 신경을 덜 쓰더라고요
English: So, I definitely felt less nervous than at a professional academy.
I'm sure you were worried

Korean: 학원의 다른 수강생들도 아직 미발급 상태인가요
English: Are other students at the academy still not receiving their certificates?
Yes, they are all unissued

Korean: 고객님 자격증 발급에 필요한 서류는 모두 구비하셨나요
English: Customer, do you have all the documents required for issuing your certificate?
Yes, I have all the necessary documents.

Korean: 그런데 이 학과는 왜 도청에 안 갖다 줄까요
English: But why doesn't this department go to the wiretapping department?

Korean: 그건 혼자 서류를 준비를 하시기에는 어려움이 있어서 그럴 거예요
English: That's probably because it's difficult to prepare the documents on your own.

Korean: 그런데 제가 서류를 다 학원에 제출했거든요
English: But I submitted all the documents to the academy.
Have you already submitted everything to the academy?

Korean: 네 말씀 하신 자료들 모두 제출했어요
English: Yes, I submitted all the materials you mentioned.
All materials will be at the academy.
Yes, the academy probably keeps them all.

Korean: 학원에서는 왜 제출 안 했다고 하던가요
English: Why did the academy say I didn't submit it?

Korean: 어떤 인증 과정을 거쳐야 한다고 하더라고요
English: They said I had to go through some kind of certification process

Korean: 그래서 서류를 모두 가져다줬는데 신경을 안 쓰는 거 같아요
English: So I brought all the documents to him, but he didn't seem to care.

Korean: 그 인증 과정이라는게 어떤 건진 설명이 없던가요
English: Wasn't there any explanation of what that certification process was?

Korean: 네 설명은 해 줬는데 들어도 모르겠더라구요
English: I gave you an explanation, but you still didn't understand.

Korean: 선생님 교육 받으셨던 기관으로 위임하여 신청하셨나요
English: Did you apply through the institution where you received training?

Korean: 네 학원에서 신청 하라고 해서 건강 검진까지 다 받았어요
English: Yes, I even got a health checkup because my school told me to.

Korean: 그런대 아직도 학원에서 도청에 가져다주지 않았더라고요
English: But the academy hasn't brought it to the wiretapping yet
Teacher, you must have been very uncomfortable.

Korean: 그래서 제가 개인적으로 원하는 거 가지고 가려고요
English: So I'm going to take what I personally want
How much is the certificate recognition fee?

Korean: 네 선생님 발급 수수료는 만 원입니다
English: Yes, teacher, the issuance fee is ten thousand won.
Is the certificate recognition fee ten thousand won?

Korean: 네 수수료 준비하시고 그 외에 시스템 등록하는 부분이 있습니다
English: Yes, please prepare the fee and there is a part where you register with the system.

Korean: 등록을 하기 위한 파일을 교육 기관을 통해서 협조를 해야 합니다
English: You must cooperate with the educational institution to submit the files for registration.
Cooperation from educational institutions is also needed.
Hello, this is #@Affiliation# Call Center#@Name# How may I help you?

Korean: 네 안녕하세요 요양 보호사 자격증 거기서 발급해주나요
English: Yes, hello. Do they issue nursing assistant certificates there?
Did you receive your first award from #@affiliation#?
I received my first teaching from #@affiliation#
Is the first region you received the grant in Chungnam?
Yes, I passed the first teaching exam in Chungnam.
I heard that they issue certificates there.
So is the issuance of the certificate new?

Korean: 네 요양 보호사 자격증 신규 발급입니다
English: Yes, this is a new issuance of a nursing assistant certificate.
Nice to meet you, I'm #@Affiliation# #@Name# How may I help you?

Korean: 다름이 아니고요 협동 조합 설립 신청을 할려고 하는데요
English: It's nothing else. I'm trying to apply for the establishment of a cooperative.

Korean: 필요한 서류를 다운 받으려는데 어떻게 해야 되죠
English: How do I download the necessary documents?

Korean: 선생님 문의 주신 부분 제가 확인 후 안내해 드리겠습니다
English: I will check the part you asked about and give you an answer.

Korean: 문의주신 협동 조합 설립 요건을 인터넷 검색해봤습니다

English: Yes, I'm trying to reissue my real estate agent license.

Korean: 분실 훼손 개명 등 어떤 재발급이십니까
English: What kind of reissue is it, such as loss, damage, or name change?
I lost it and want to get it reissued.

Korean: 어디로 통화해야 안내 받을 수 있습니까
English: Where should I call for guidance?

Korean: 네 제가 서류 확인 후에 안내해 드리겠습니다
English: Yes, I will guide you after checking the documents.
Teacher, could you please wait a moment?

Korean: 그리고 제가 개명도 해서 이름도 다릅니다
English: And I changed my name, so my name is different.

Korean: 그러시면 개명 재발급으로 신청을 해 주시면 좋으실 듯합니다
English: In that case, I think it would be better if you applied for a reissue of your name change.

Korean: 개명 시 해당 서류 확인 후에 안내해 드리겠습니다
English: We will inform you after checking the relevant documents in case of name change.
Yes, I understand. Please guide me.

Korean: 도청으로 방문하시면 바로 발급이 가능한 것으로 확인됩니다
English: If you visit the wiretapping office, you can confirm that it can be issued immediately.
Shall I guide you through the documents to be submitted by mail?
Yes please tell me what do you need

Korean: #@소속# 홈페이지에 민원 자격증 신청서에서 다운로드 가능하십니다
English: #@Affiliation# You can download the application form for civil petition qualification from the homepage.
There are a lot of documents required. Can you take notes?
Yes, I can, but my phone battery is dead.
Then, would you please contact me again?
Yes, I will. Thank you.
Yes, teacher, this is #@affiliation#. Can I still talk?
Yes, please speak. I'm listening.

Korean: 네 확인 결과 본인이 가능하다고 확인됩니다
English: Yes, I have verified that you are eligible.

Korean: 다만 정확한 확인은 가까운 주민 센터에서만 가능하십니다
English: However, accurate confirmation is only possible at a nearby community center.

Korean: 해당 기관에서 정확히 문의해 보셔야 할 것 같습니다
English: I think you should inquire directly with the relevant agency.
I understand that only I can do this.

Korean: 네 본인이 직접 신청하는 부분으로 확인됩니다
English: Yes, it is confirmed through the application you made yourself.
Well, as long as I don't die

Korean: 말소된 주민등록증을 되살릴 방법도 본인이라는 거죠
English: The only way to restore a cancelled resident registration card is to do it yourself.
Your agent cannot act on your behalf.

Korean: 선생님 다만 인터넷 검색이 정확하지 않을 수 있습니다
English: Teacher, but internet search may not be accurate

Korean: 주민 등록관 련 신고는 인터넷으로 신청하실 경우에도요
English: Even if you apply for resident registration-related reports online,
This requires public certification.

Korean: 읍면동 주민센터로 방문 접수를 해 주시기 바랍니다
English: Please visit your local town/village/dong community center to register.
Is it really not possible?

Korean: 선생님 정확한 문의는 읍면동 주민센터에 문의를 하셔야 합니다
English: Teacher, for exact inquiries, you should contact your local community center.
What if my resident registration card has been cancelled?

Korean: 대리인이나 공인인증서를 통해 되살렸다고 해도 말이에요
English: Even if it was revived through an agent or public certificate.

Korean: 본인이 모르면 옮겨진 주소지 변동도 모른다는 거죠
English: If you don't know, you won't know that your address has changed.

Korean: 선생님 죄송하지만 본인 여부를 확인할 수 없습니다
English: I'm sorry, teacher, but I can't verify your identity.

Korean: 그래서 전화 상으로는 더 이상의 상담이 어려우실 듯합니다
English: So, I don't think we can discuss this further over the phone.
Hello, this is #@affiliation#. How may I help you?

Korean: 주소지 변경한 거 확인하려고 하는데 좀 안 되나요
English: I'm trying to check if my address has changed, but it's not working.

Korean: 제가 어느 쪽으로 주소지를 옮겼는지 몰라요
English: I don't know which way my address has moved.

Korean: 네 선생님 혹시 예전 주소지는 모르십니까
English: Yes, sir, do you happen to know my old address?
I only know that my old address was in Chungnam.
Which city or county in South Chungcheong Province are you from?

Korean: 아니 제가 예전 주소는 경기도 수원시였고요
English: No, my old address was Suwon-si, Gyeonggi-do.
Yes, you were in Suwon, Gyeonggi-do.

Korean: 그 다음에 옮겨진 주소는 어디인지 몰라요
English: I don't know where the address was moved to next.

Korean: 그렇다면 이전 주소지로 문의를 주셔도 좋으실 듯합니다
English: In that case, I think it would be better to contact the previous address.

Korean: 이전 주소지인 수원시에 전화 상으로 답변을 들을 수 있나요
English: Can I get an answer over the phone at my previous address in Suwon City?

Korean: 상세 업무는 저희 쪽에서 도움 드리기가 어렵습니다
English: It is difficult for us to help you with detailed work.

Korean: 직접 상담해 보시는 부분이 가장 좋으실 듯합니다
English: I think it would be best to consult with them directly.

Korean: 저는 지금 수원시가 아니라는 것밖에 못 들었어요
English: All I've heard is that it's not Suwon City right now.

Korean: 등본 떼고 막 이러지 않는 한 알 수 없는 거잖아요
English: You wouldn't know unless you took a copy and did something like that.
Yes, that's right, teacher.

Korean: 그럼 혹시 주민 등록이 말소가 됐다고 하면요
English: Then what if your resident registration has been cancelled?

Korean: 어느 쪽에도 주소지가 등록되어 있지 않다는 뜻 아닌가요
English: Doesn't that mean that the address is not registered on either side?

Korean: 네 말소는 주소지가 등록되어 있지 않는 부분입니다
English: Yes, the deletion is the part where the address is not registered.

Korean: 그럼 말소된 사람의 주민등록을 이용할 수 있지 않나요
English: Then, can't I use the resident registration of a person whose registration has been deleted?

Korean: 다른 사람이 대리 신청으로 주소지 이전을 할 수 있는 건가요
English: Can someone else change my address by proxy?

Korean: 말소 신청 관련해서 대리인이 신청 가능한지 확인해 보겠습니다
English: I will check if an agent can apply for the cancellation.
Yes, please find out quickly.
Nice to meet you, I'm #@Affiliation# #@Name# How may I help you?

Korean: 저기 뭐 좀 문의할 게 있는데요
English: I have something to ask you.

Korean: 혹시 본인 몰래 주소지가 옮겨질 수 있나요
English: Is it possible for my address to change without my knowledge?

Korean: 이럴 경우에는 어떻게 대처를 해야 되는 건가요
English: How should I deal with this situation?

Korean: 주소지의 읍면동 주민 센터로 문의 부탁드립니다
English: Please contact the local community center in your town or district.

Korean: 그러면 옮겨갈 주소지를 알 수 있나요
English: Then can you tell me the address to which I will move?

Korean: 죄송하지만 그 부분은 저희 쪽에서 확인이 어렵습니다
English: Sorry, but we can't confirm that part.

Korean: 해당 지역의 읍면동 주민 센터에 문의 부탁드립니다
English: Please contact the local town/village/dong community center.

Korean: 전화상으로 알아볼 수 있는 방법은 전혀 없는 건가요
English: Is there no way to find out over the phone?

Korean: 개인 정보로 인하여 저희 측에서는 전화 상으로 어렵습니다
English: Due to privacy concerns, we are unable to answer your questions over the phone.

Korean: 직접 방문 또는 해당 주민 센터로 전화 상담 부탁드립니다
English: Please visit in person or call the relevant community center for consultation.

Korean: 아니 제가 알 수도 없는 데다가 지금 갇혀 있는 쪽이라서요
English: No, I don't know and I'm the one who's stuck right now.

Korean: 밖에 나갈 수 없고 병원에 입원 중이거든요
English: I can't go out and I'm in the hospital.
Yes, that must be hard.

Korean: 예 그래서 혹시 이런 경우에는 어떻게 대처해야 하나요
English: Yes, so how should I deal with this situation?

Korean: 입원해 있는 환자가 할 수 있는 방법이 없을까요
English: Is there anything that a hospitalized patient can do?

Korean: 네 죄송합니다 주민 센터로 문의해 주시는 부분이 좋으실 듯합니다
English: Yes, I'm sorry. I think it would be better to contact the community center.
Okay, I'll call you back.
Hello, this is #@affiliation# counseling center.
I'm moving and waiting for a daycare center.

Korean: 선생님께서 이사 후 거주할 지역이 어디십니까
English: Where will you be living after you move?

Korean: 읍면동 주민 센터 말씀해 주시면 연결 도와드리겠습니다
English: If you tell us at your local community center, we will help you connect.
Do you also accept applications for this at the community center?

Korean: 네 다만 해당 주민 센터에 신고를 해 주셔야 합니다
English: Yes, but you must report it to the relevant community center.

Korean: 아이들의 주민 번호나 이런 걸 알려 주고 신고를 해야 되나요
English: Do I have to report it by giving my children's resident registration number or something like that?

Korean: 네 맞습니다 어린이집 입소 대기 신청을 위해서는요
English: Yes, that's right. To apply for daycare center admission,
Please report to the community center first.

Korean: 담당자와 따로 상담을 해 보시는 부분이 좋으실 듯합니다
English: I think it would be better to consult with the person in charge separately.
Yes, then I will move to #@address#

Korean: #@소속# 대표 번호 확인 후 연결하겠습니다 잠시만 기다려 주세요
English: #@Affiliation# I will connect you after checking the representative number. Please wait a moment.
#@Address# Is this the correct address?

Korean: 네 현재는 팔 월 일 일자로 #@주소#으로 승격이 되었습니다
English: Yes, as of August 1st, it has been upgraded to #@Address#
I will connect you directly to the main number.

Korean: 혹시 대표 번호도 알 수 있을까요
English: Could you please tell me your representative number?
Yes, can you take notes now?
Yes, you can take notes now
Yes, this is #@phone number#. I will connect you.
Nice to meet you, I'm #@Affiliation# #@Name# How may I help you?

Korean: 제가 지금 서울에서 어린이집을 보내고 있는데요
English: I am currently sending my child to a daycare center in Seoul.

Korean: 두 달 뒤에 충청남도 홍성으로 이사를 가거든요
English: I'm moving to Hongseong, South Chungcheong Province in two months.

Korean: 그곳은 어린이집 대기를 어떻게 해야 되는지 궁금해서요
English: I'm curious about how the waiting list for daycare is there.

Korean: 네 그러시군요 이사 하시는 읍면동 주민센터에 신청을 하셔도 되십니다
English: Yes, that's right. You can apply at the community center of the town or district you are moving to.

Korean: 제가 신청 가능한 부분이 있는지도 확인해 보겠습니다
English: I will also check if there is any part I can apply for.
Could you please wait a moment?
Yes, please check and let me know.

Korean: 선생님 오래 기다리게 해 드려 죄송합니다
English: Teacher, I'm sorry for keeping you waiting for so long.

Korean: 지역 내 어린이집 입소 대기 신청으로 확인해 보았는데요
English: I checked by applying for admission to a local daycare center.

Korean: 충남만 따로 입소 대기 신청 가능한 홈페이지는 확인이 어렵습니다
English: It is difficult to confirm the website where you can apply for admission only in Chungnam Province.

Korean: 다만 #@소속# 으로 입소 대기 신청하시는 부분은 가능하십니다
English: However, it is possible to apply for admission as #@affiliation#

Korean: 거기에 로그인한 뒤 아이들 입소 대기를 신청하면 되나요
English: Can I log in there and apply for my children's admission?

Korean: 네 메인 화면에 어린이집 입소 대기 신청 배너가 확인됩니다
English: Yes, you will see a banner for applying for daycare center admission on your main screen.
Teacher, have you checked?

Korean: 네 확인했어요 여기서 하면 될 것 같아요
English: Yes, I checked. I think it'll work here.

Korean: 네 다행입니다 문의 사항 더 있으십니까
English: Yes, that's great. Do you have any further questions?
It's okay, thank you. Have a nice day.
Hello, this is #@affiliation#
Yes, thank you #@Affiliation# #@Name#
Hello, how may I help you?

Korean: 민원인께서 어린이집 공기청정기 지원 관련 담당자 요청입니다
English: This is a request from the person in charge regarding support for air purifiers in daycare centers.

Korean: 담당자 뒷번호가 #@전번#이고요 다시 한 번 연락 주시겠어요
English: The last number of the person in charge is #@phone number#. Please call me again.
Yes, I understand. Thank you.
I'm really sorry I couldn't help you.

Korean: 제가 확인해 보니 담당자가 다른 분으로 확인되었습니다
English: I checked and it turned out that the person in charge was someone else

Korean: 그렇군요 제가 다시 한 번 해당 민원인께 연결을 시도하겠습니다
English: Okay, I'll try to connect with the complainant again.
Yes, please connect me with the person in charge.

Korean: 말씀 드리지만 민원인의 어린이집 공기청정기 지원 관련 문의입니다
English: I would like to ask you about the request for support for air purifiers at the daycare center.

Korean: 같이 확인할게요 #@소속#에서 공기청정기 사업을 병행하고 있어요
English: Let's check together. #@Affiliation# is also running an air purifier business.

Korean: 하지만 지금은 어린이집 공기청정기를 시행하지 않습니다
English: However, we are not currently implementing air purifiers in daycare centers.

Korean: 민원인께서 현재 관련 문의로 기다리고 계셔서요
English: The complainant is currently waiting for a related inquiry.
Sir, can you give me an answer right away?
You're waiting for a call right now
Yes, can you return my call?
Yes, you can call me right away.
Nice to meet you, I'm #@Affiliation# #@Name# How may I help you?
I would like to ask you about the daycare department.

Korean: 선생님 실례지만 어린이집 어떤 어떤 문의이십니까
English: Excuse me, teacher. What kind of inquiry do you have about the daycare center?

Korean: 이번에 어린이집에 공기청정기 지원하는 게 있다고 들어서요
English: I heard that they are providing air purifiers to daycare centers this time.

Korean: 다른 쪽에 다 시행이 됐다고 하는데 여기는 어떤지 궁금해서요
English: I heard it's been implemented on other sides, but I'm curious about what it's like here.

Korean: 지난 번에 일괄적으로 모두 받았다고 얘기를 하시더라고요
English: You said you received it all at once last time.

Korean: 이번 달에 시행이 이미 된 겁니까
English: Has it already been implemented this month?

Korean: 아니면 확정된 날짜가 혹시 있는 겁니까
English: Or is there a confirmed date?

Korean: 언제 공문이 내려오는 건지 알고 싶어서 전화했습니다
English: I called to find out when the official document would be released.

Korean: 선생님 실례지만 해당 지역에 시군청에는 문의를 해 보셨습니까
English: Excuse me, teacher, but have you tried contacting the city or county office in that area?

Korean: 아니요 안 했습니다 제가 여기 서산이고 #@소속#에 문의를 했거든요
English: No, I didn't. I'm here in Seosan and I contacted #@affiliation#.

Korean: 근데 도청에서 시행돼야 시로 내려온다 그러더라고요
English: But they said that it has to be implemented in the city hall before it can be passed down to the city.

Korean: 빠른 데가 도청이라고 얘기를 하셔서 연락드렸어요
English: I contacted you because you said that the quick one was wiretapping.

Korean: 네 그러시군요 제가 도청 담당자 확인 후 안내해 드리겠습니다
English: Yes, I see. I will check with the wiretapping officer and let you know.
Could you please wait a moment?
Yes, I understand. Please check and contact me.

Korean: 선생님 오래 기다리게 해 드려 정말 죄송합니다
English: Teacher, I'm really sorry for keeping you waiting for so long.

Korean: 현재 정확한 담당자 확인이 어려운 상태입니다
English: It is currently difficult to confirm the exact person in charge.

Korean: #@소속#에 관련 담당자에게 문의 후 연결해 드리겠습니다
English: #@Affiliation# We will contact you after contacting the relevant person in charge.
Sorry for keeping you waiting. This is counselor #@Affiliation#, #@Name#

Korean: 이사 편리 부동산 정보에서 확인을 하였는데요
English: I checked the information on moving convenience real estate.

Korean: 개별 공지 지사가 삼백 육십 일만 원으로 확인이 됩니다
English: The individual notice branch office is confirmed to be 3,610,000 won

Korean: 그게 아니라 토지하고 주택하고 가격 합계가 얼마가 되나요
English: No, what is the total price of the land and the house?

Korean: 토지 소재지에 개별 공시 지가로 안내해 드렸습니다
English: We have provided you with individual public notice prices for the land location.
The price of the house is the announced price
Sorry, but it was difficult to confirm the house.
If you type in the address I mentioned earlier, it will appear.
Sorry, only the land price can be confirmed

Korean: 주택 가격 관련해서 문의 하시는 경우이십니까
English: Are you inquiring about housing prices?

Korean: 해당 부분은 서울 부동산 정보 조회 시스템에서 가능합니다
English: This section is available in the Seoul Real Estate Information Inquiry System.
Okay, I understand. Thank you.

Korean: 제가 더 감사합니다 다른 문의 사항 있으십니까
English: I appreciate it more. Do you have any other questions?
No other inquiries

Korean: 네 업무 처리 잘 되시길 바랍니다 #소속# #@이름#였습니다
English: I hope your work goes well #affiliation# #@name#
#@Affiliation# #@Name# How may I help you?
#@Address# I want to find out the public housing price.

Korean: 해당 지역의 주택 공시 가격이십니까 혹은 주택 공시 지가이십니까
English: Is this the assessed value of the house in the area or the assessed land price of the house?
This is the public housing price.
Excuse me, which city or county are you from?
This is #@Address# in Songpa-gu, Seoul

Korean: 네 선생님 그러시면 해당 시청 #@전번#으로 문의 부탁드립니다
English: Yes, sir. If so, please contact the relevant city hall at #@phone number#.

Korean: 그게 아니고요 간단한 건데 컴퓨터로 잠깐만 조회 한 번 해 주세요
English: No, it's simple. Please check it out on your computer for a moment.
Yes, then please tell me your address.
